title: Ticket #4182: More cleanup of read_multiple_logs.cpp
description:
I think we should (eventually, at least) do some additional cleanup of read_multiple_logs.cpp that I don't want to address right now:

  • Get rid of the MultiLogFiles::readFile() method and read Stork submit files line-by-line instead of reading them into a single string.
  • Possibly convert MultiLogFiles::loadLogFileNameFromSubFile() to use MultiLogFiles::loadValueFromSubFile().
  • Possibly convert MultiLogFiles::getQueueCountFromSubmitFile() to use MultiLogFiles::getValuesFromFile().

(And note that some of the stuff in there is Stork-specific, and we don't have any way to test that -- see #526.)
creator: wenger
